titleStmt.title: Flovvres or eloquent phrases of the Latine speach, gathered ont [sic] of al the sixe comœdies of Terence. VVherof those of the first thre were selected by Nicolas Vdall. And those of the latter three novv to them annexed by I. Higgins, very profitable and necessary for the expedite knovvledge of the Latine tounge
Selections. English and Latin
titleStmt.author: Terence.
Udall, Nicholas, 1505-1556.
Higgins, John, fl. 1570-1602.

notesStmt.note: Passages in Latin followed by English translations.
At foot of title: Cum priuilegio.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
